trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The user-supplied `state` parameter is the object passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method that identifies the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供`state`參數是傳遞至物件<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>方法，以識別非同步寫入作業。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the scope of the progress changed event such as for an entire multiple document sequence, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 指定進度的範圍的列舉值已變更事件例如整個多文件順序、 單一文件或在單一頁面。

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope defined by `writingLevel`, the number of documents or the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 根據所定義的範圍`writingLevel`，文件或已寫入的頁面數目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of data that has been written.
The user-supplied object that identifies the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可識別寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 取得文件或已寫入的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>, Number specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>，數字會指定已寫入的文件數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, Number is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 如需所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情況下，數字是已寫入的頁面數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages that have been written at the time of the event.
trans-unit.target: 文件或網頁已寫入時的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the writing progress.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出寫入進度的範圍。

trans-unit.source: When the WritingLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 當 WritingLevel 屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>屬性會指定已寫入的文件數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel>

trans-unit.source: For all other WritingLevel cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 針對所有其他 WritingLevel 案例，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>屬性是已寫入的頁面數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of writing a multiple document sequence, a single document, or single page.
trans-unit.target: 列舉，指出寫入多個文件順序、 單一文件或單一頁面的範圍。
